attributes.action: ALL DOG TO BE MUZZLED IN PUBLIC AND REGISTERING ALL DOGS
attributes.additional_details: The recent unfortunate incidents have yet again highlighted the need for strong safe guarding measures for the public . A dog attack is very traumatic for everyone.  Death by dogs has increased as well as attacks by dogs . The Public should feel safe to walk the streets unfortunately there are dogs that have owners who do not have the best welfare for there animals . We should all feel safe in public .Dogs Attacks are causing tremendous pain to everyone one doesn't know when a dog will turn .
attributes.background: I would like to see the Government introduce strong laws that will help the public be safe . Safety is paramount.  The recent dog incidents confirm that anyone at anytime can be attacked .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/643650
Bring back a Dog Licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638225
Require leads, muzzles and licences for all dogs
